H0.text: what color is the cue ball in pool. Yellow

H1.text: what color is the cue ball in pool. Red

H2.text: what color is the cue ball in pool. Blue

H3.text: what color is the cue ball in pool. white

A4.text: More recently, optical systems that recognize the cue ball, which is more translucent than the other balls due to its solid white color, and separate it mechanically have been developed.

A5.text: In British-style eight-ball pool and its blackball variant, fifteen object balls are used, but fall into two unnumbered groups, the reds (or less commonly blues) and yellows, with a white cue ball, and black 8 ball.
